name: COD (Roobidium)
description:
A game whose reputation precedes it, you may have already heard of COD. I know I hear of it all the time. When it's time to hang out, everyone is asking each other "Wanna go play some COD?" and now you can get in on the hype as well.

COD obviously refers to this game, and probably nothing else.

What a good idea too, who wouldn't want some quality roleplaying time as the magnificent COD, an important part of our oceans.
